channel.title: BO on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in BO on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Dashboard
item.description: Dashboard Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10077 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/01_dashboard.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered

item.title: Orders
item.description: Orders Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10078 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/02_orders.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Orders > Orders page The Orders page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the button “Add new order” The New order page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Orders > Invoices page The Invoices page is displayed

item.title: Catalog
item.description: Catalog Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10080 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/03_catalog.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Catalog > Products page The Products page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the first row The product page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Catalog > Products page

item.title: Customers
item.description: Customers Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10081 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/04_customers.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Customers > Customers page The Customers page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the icon “View” on the first row The “View customer” page is displayed

item.title: Customer Service
item.description: Customer Service Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10084 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/05_customerService.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Customer Service > Customer Service page The Customer Service page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Customer Service > Order messages page The Order messages page is displayed

item.title: Statistics
item.description: Statistics Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10083 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/06_statistics.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Statistics page The Statistics page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to the sub-tab “Available quantities” The sub-tab “Available quantities” is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to the sub-tab “Best brands” The sub-tab “Best brands” is displayed

item.title: Modules
item.description: Modules Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10095 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/07_modules.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Modules > Module Manager page The Modules > Module Manager page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to the tab “Alerts” The tab “Alerts” is displayed

item.title: Design
item.description: Design Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10107 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/08_design.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Design > Theme & Logo page The Theme & Logo page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the “Add new theme” button The “New theme” page is displayed

item.title: Shipping
item.description: Shipping Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10131 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/09_shipping.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Shipping > Carriers The Carriers page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on Add new carrier The Add new Carriers page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go back to Shipping > Carriers page

item.title: Payment

item.title: Shop Parameters
item.description: Shop Parameters Details Component : Core Status : Automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10188 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/12_shopParameters.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Shop Parameters > General The preferences page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Maintenance tab The Maintenance page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Order Settings The Order settings page is displayed
